text: Lanarkshire (Siorrachd Lannraig in Gaelic), also called the County of Lanark, is a county of Scotland. ==Towns== *Airdrie *Bellshill *Biggar *Blantyre *Bothwell *Bishopbriggs *Cambuslang *Carluke *Coatbridge *East Kilbride *Glasgow *Hamilton *Lanark *Larkhall *Lesmahagow *Motherwell *Rutherglen *Shotts *Uddingston *Wishaw ==Rivers== *North Medwin River *South Medwin River *River Clyde ==Related pages== *North Lanarkshire *South Lanarkshire
title: Lanarkshire
